plot: Oswald Löpelmann unsettles Tina so much that she messes up the audition. The whole advertising campaign, which was developed by Clemens and Daniel, does not suit the great Löpelmann. He invites himself to dinner with Vera and Clemens. This means that the two have to play a sweet home for an entire evening. Lilo wants to take revenge on Michael Döring with the help of Elke. Gerd Spengler gives Peter the chance to get the cafeteria in shape. His first act: he fires Marina.
